query:
SELECT 
  p.id, p.order_number, p.order_date, p.customer_ref, p.raw_area_text,
  h.customer_name as hospital_name,
  a.name as area_name,
  pl.product_code, pl.product_description, pl.quantity, pl.unit_price
FROM purchases p
LEFT JOIN hospitals h ON p.hospital_id = h.id
LEFT JOIN areas a ON p.area_id = a.id
LEFT JOIN purchase_lines pl ON p.id = pl.purchase_id
WHERE p.order_number = 'SO-U-00000546'

  pl.product_code, pl.product_description, pl.quantity, pl.unit_price
FROM purchases p
LEFT JOIN hospitals h ON p.hospital_id = h.id
LEFT JOIN areas a ON p.area_id = a.id
